sentences.sContent: The gift, the snowflake, the starry sky, the moonlight all give you.
sentences.sContent_eng: The gift, the snowflake, the starry sky, the moonlight all give you.
sentences.sCn: 礼物，雪花，满天星斗的天空，在月光下的所有给你。

sentences.sContent: Bell is my greetings, singing is my blessing, snowflake is my card, wine is my kiss, the breeze is I embrace, happiness is my gift!
sentences.sContent_eng: Bell is my greetings, singing is my blessing, snowflake is my card, wine is my kiss, the breeze is I embrace, happiness is my gift!
sentences.sCn: 钟声是我的问候，歌声是我的祝福，雪花是我的贺卡，美酒是我的飞吻，清风是我的拥抱，快乐是我的礼物！

sentences.sContent: Moonlight Christmas and snowflake bless my speech as you, I give you with blessings, are you happy?
sentences.sContent_eng: Moonlight Christmas and snowflake bless my speech as you, I give you with blessings, are you happy?
sentences.sCn: 圣诞的月光和雪花都不如你祝福我的话语，我把同的祝福给你，你快乐吗？

remMethod.val: snow(雪) + flake(薄片) → 雪花， 雪片

trans.tranOther: a small soft flat piece of frozen water that falls as snow
